content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Mister Heine, thank you for showing me the apartment. May I ask if there is any flexibility in the rental price? I am looking for the best deal possible.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Hello, I would like to negotiate the rental price. I am open to discussing the details. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, Mister Heine. Can you provide me with more information about the apartment, such as its location, the number of rooms, and any amenities it may have?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
Yes, the apartment is located in the city center, has two rooms and a balcony, and has a modern kitchen and bathroom. It is also close to public transportation and shopping centers.

Regarding the rental price, I am looking for something reasonable and fair. I am willing to discuss the details and come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Understood, Mister Heine. I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month, which I believe is reasonable and fair given the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Ryanah Rahman
